orderDate.description: Date which the order is placed,If order date is not provided, system will add the current date.

applicationSource.description: Application source is an enum, which indicates this order created by which source like API, XpoConnect, EDI etc.

orderNumber.description: Order's number to uniquely identify order.

orderNotes.description: Notes for this order as array values.

type.description: Type values such as CLIENT_REFERENCE , CP, CS etc.

orderReferenceNumbers.description: If customer has more than one reference number e.g. primary order number , secondary order number.

additionalServices.description: Additional service required for this order.

cityName.description: City name belongs to stop location.

stateCode.description: State code of the stop location.

scheduledTimeFrom.description: The earliest time by which the service provider can reach the stop. ISO8601 UTC date-time format required

scheduledTimeTo.description: The Latest time by which the service provider can reach the stop. ISO8601 UTC date-time format required

value.description: Actual value of stop reference code.

stopReferenceNumbers.description: The collection of reference numbers associated with this stop, its type is same as order reference object.

sequenceNo.description: Stop sequence number, required Required only if multi stop quote request.

stops.description: Stops information for this Order including origin and destination.

requestedDeliveryDate.description: Requested delivery date of order. ISO8601 UTC date-time format required

classCode.description: This code represents product freight class..

nmfcCode.description: Commodity or type of product is assigned a National Motor Freight Classification

isTemperatureControlled.description: Whether item is temperature controlled or not.

isHazmat.description: Whether item is hazardous or not.

unNumber.description: Identification number to identify dangerous goods.

hazardousItemInfo.description: Hazardous information if the item is Hazardous material (IsHazmat = true)

htsCode.description: HTS codes are used to classify and define internationally traded goods

sku.description: Stock-keeping unit or SKU refers to a specific item stored to a specific location.

type.description: Type values such as CLIENT_REFERENCE , CP, CS etc.

itemReferenceNumbers.description: This object holds the collection of reference numbers associated with this items.

partnerIdentifierCode.description: Partner identifier code used for uniquely identify the partner.
